QuestData.Title: Okrilla and the Blasted Lands
QuestData.Description: I have one final dispatch to deliver to you, $n. It comes from Dreadmaul Hold, to the south, in the Blasted Lands.$b$bWarmatron Okrilla is waging battle against the Alliance forces of Nethergarde Keep, and she needs the assistance of a stout $c. You immediately sprung to mind.$b$bTravel south into the Blasted Lands, then head west. Good luck, $n.
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Okrilla at Dreadmaul Hold in the Blasted Lands.
